text: ‘athaba emana kono srsti ya tomadera antare khuba'i bara mane haya [1]; ‘tabu'o tara balabe, ‘ke amaderake punarut'thita karabe?’ Baluna, ‘tini'i, yini tomaderake prathamabara srsti karechena [2].’ Atahpara tara apanara samane matha narabe [3] o balabe, ‘seta kabe[4]?’ Baluna, sambhabata seta habe sighra'i
